analyzed: 佛說一髻尊陀羅尼經 開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
translated: The Buddha Speaks the Dhāraṇī Sūtra of the Venerable Ekajaṭī🔽Kaifuyi Tongsansi, Specially Advanced, Probationary Honglu Qing, Duke of Su,

original: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
analyzed: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
translated: with an estate of three thousand households, granted purple, posthumously granted Minister of Works, canonized as the Great Mirror,

original: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門不空奉　詔譯如是我聞。
analyzed: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門不空奉　詔譯如是我聞。
translated: with the official title of Great Broad Wisdom, Tripiṭaka Master Amoghavajra of the Daxingshansi Monastery, translated by imperial decree. Thus have I heard.

original: 一時佛在王舍大城鷲峯山中。
analyzed: 一時佛在王舍大城鷲峯山中。
translated: Once, the Buddha was at Vulture Peak in the great city of Rājagṛha.
He was together with innumerable Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas.
They surrounded him in front and behind.

original: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva
was together with innumerable Vidyādhara sages.
They surrounded him in front and behind.
He came to where the Buddha was. Having arrived,
he prostrated with his whole body and bowed at the Buddha's feet.

original: 禮佛足已遶佛三匝却坐一面。
analyzed: 禮佛足已遶佛三匝却坐一面。
translated: Having bowed at the Buddha's feet, he circumambulated the Buddha three times and then sat to one side.
At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva
addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,
there are various gods and Vidyādhara sages,
those who believe in the great Brahmā.

original: 令欲降伏大梵天及諸天仙等。
analyzed: 令欲降伏大梵天及諸天仙等。
translated: Wishing to subdue the great Brahma Heaven and the celestial sages, etc.
I wish for the Buddha's permission.

original: 欲令一切眾生念善法故。
analyzed: 欲令一切眾生念善法故。
translated: In order to cause all sentient beings to think of wholesome dharmas.

original: 欲令一切眾生無憂惱故。
analyzed: 欲令一切眾生無憂惱故。
translated: In order to cause all sentient beings to be free from worries and afflictions.
In order to eliminate all sentient beings' illnesses.

original: 及一切障難災怪惡夢悉除滅故。
analyzed: 及一切障難災怪惡夢悉除滅故。
translated: And in order to eliminate all obstacles, calamities, strange occurrences, and bad dreams.
In order to eliminate all untimely illnesses and deaths.

original: 欲除一切諸惡心者令柔軟故。
analyzed: 欲除一切諸惡心者令柔軟故。
translated: In order to eliminate all evil minds and make them gentle.

original: 除一切諸魔鬼神障難不起故。
analyzed: 除一切諸魔鬼神障難不起故。
translated: In order to eliminate all demons, ghosts, and spirits, and prevent obstacles from arising.

original: 世尊我今有根本心陀羅尼。
analyzed: 世尊我今有根本心陀羅尼。
translated: World-Honored One, I now have a fundamental mind dhāraṇī.
Which can eliminate all sentient beings' karmic offenses.

original: 世尊我未曾見有若天若魔若釋梵。
analyzed: 世尊我未曾見有若天若魔若釋梵。
translated: World-Honored One, I have never seen any gods, demons, Śakra, Brahmā,
Śramaṇas, brāhmans, etc.
Who can uphold this mantra.
If one recites, writes, spreads,
Or uses this method to protect one's body.
If one enters the battlefield to fight.
If one is harmed by poison.
Uphold this dhāraṇī.
All difficulties will be unable to harm you.

original: 如是之法一切諸佛所念。
analyzed: 如是之法一切諸佛所念。
translated: Such a Dharma is remembered by all Buddhas.
This dhāraṇī method of mine

original: 已經無量諸佛所說世尊我於因地。
analyzed: 已經無量諸佛所說世尊我於因地。
translated: Has already been spoken by innumerable Buddhas. World-Honored One, in the past,
Beyond eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River,

original: 有佛名百蓮華眼頂無障礙功德光明王如來。
analyzed: 有佛名百蓮華眼頂無障礙功德光明王如來。
translated: There was a Buddha named Hundred Lotus Eyes, Summit Unobstructed Merit and Virtue Light King Tathāgata.
At that time, in the presence of that Buddha,
I became the king among great vidyādhara sages.

original: 於彼佛所受得此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 於彼佛所受得此陀羅尼。
translated: I received this dhāraṇī from that Buddha.
When I obtained it,
The Buddhas of the ten directions all appeared before me.
Having seen the Buddhas appear,
I suddenly attained an unprecedented wisdom.

original: 當知此真言有如是神力。
analyzed: 當知此真言有如是神力。
translated: Know that this mantra has such spiritual power.
It can benefit innumerable sentient beings.
If there are good men and good women

original: 能晝夜慇懃受持讀誦令不忘失。
analyzed: 能晝夜慇懃受持讀誦令不忘失。
translated: Who can diligently uphold and recite it day and night without forgetting,
When reciting this dhāraṇī,
Do not think of other objects.

original: 每至白月十五日或黑月八日。
analyzed: 每至白月十五日或黑月八日。
translated: Every time it is the fifteenth day of the bright month or the eighth day of the dark month,
Wash the body, put on new clean clothes,
Uphold this dhāraṇī,
Make mudrās to protect the body,
Take pure mud to anoint the altar,
Square and round, four cubits, having finished setting the boundary,

original: 請我一髻明王於壇中心坐。
analyzed: 請我一髻明王於壇中心坐。
translated: Invite me, the One-Topknot Bright King, to sit in the center of the altar,
Burn incense, scatter flowers, and make various offerings,

original: 禮拜懺悔誦真言一百八遍。
analyzed: 禮拜懺悔誦真言一百八遍。
translated: Bow, repent, and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: 持此明者現身即得十種果報。
analyzed: 持此明者現身即得十種果報。
translated: Those who uphold this bright spell will attain ten kinds of karmic rewards in their present bodies.
What are the ten?
First, the body will always be free from illness.

original: 二者恒為十方諸佛憶念。
analyzed: 二者恒為十方諸佛憶念。
translated: Second, one will always be remembered by the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 三者一切財物衣服飲食自然充足常無乏少。
analyzed: 三者一切財物衣服飲食自然充足常無乏少。
translated: Third, all wealth, clothing, food, and drink will naturally be sufficient, and one will always be without lack.
Fourth, one will be able to defeat enemies.

original: 五者能使一切眾生發起慈心。
analyzed: 五者能使一切眾生發起慈心。
translated: Fifth, one will be able to cause all beings to give rise to a compassionate mind.

original: 六者一切蠱毒一切熱病無能侵害。
analyzed: 六者一切蠱毒一切熱病無能侵害。
translated: Sixth, all poisons and all fevers will be unable to harm.

original: 七者一切刀杖不能為害。
analyzed: 七者一切刀杖不能為害。
translated: Seventh, all swords and staves cannot harm them.

original: 八者一切水難不能漂溺。
analyzed: 八者一切水難不能漂溺。
translated: Eighth, all water disasters cannot drown them.
Ninth, fire cannot burn them.
Tenth, they do not suffer any untimely death.
These are the ten.
They will also attain four kinds of karmic rewards.
What are the four?
First, they will not be harmed by birds and beasts.
Second, they will not fall into hell.

original: 三者臨命終時得見十方諸佛。
analyzed: 三者臨命終時得見十方諸佛。
translated: Third, when they are about to die, they will see the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 四者命終之後生無量壽國。
analyzed: 四者命終之後生無量壽國。
translated: Fourth, after they die, they will be reborn in the land of Amitāyus.

original: 世尊我念過恒河沙數劫。
analyzed: 世尊我念過恒河沙數劫。
translated: World-Honored One, I recall eons ago, more numerous than the sands of the Ganges River,

original: 爾時有佛名曼陀羅香如來。
analyzed: 爾時有佛名曼陀羅香如來。
translated: at that time there was a buddha named Mandarava Fragrance Tathāgata.

original: 我於彼佛時為優婆塞名曰翳迦惹吒婆羅門。
analyzed: 我於彼佛時為優婆塞名曰翳迦惹吒婆羅門。
translated: At that time, I was a lay disciple named Ikarajata Brahmin.
I attained this Dharma from that buddha.

original: 常為百千萬億梵天說法。
analyzed: 常為百千萬億梵天說法。
translated: I always taught the Dharma to hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of Brahmas.
There was none who did not submit to it.

original: 一切諸佛大慈大悲大喜大捨智慧藏法門。
analyzed: 一切諸佛大慈大悲大喜大捨智慧藏法門。
translated: The Dharma door of the great kindness, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity of all buddhas' wisdom treasury,
By the power of this mantra,

original: 能救一切眾生牢獄繫閉杻械枷鎖。
analyzed: 能救一切眾生牢獄繫閉杻械枷鎖。
translated: One can save all sentient beings from prison, bondage, shackles, and chains.
Those facing execution, water, fire, and other difficulties,
And various sufferings, I always rescue and protect them,

original: 令得解脫一切夜叉羅剎斯等。
analyzed: 令得解脫一切夜叉羅剎斯等。
translated: Enabling them to be liberated from all yakshas, rakshasas, and others.
By the power of this Dharma seal and dharani,

original: 令諸夜叉羅剎斯等皆發善心。
analyzed: 令諸夜叉羅剎斯等皆發善心。
translated: It causes all yakshas, rakshasas, and others to give rise to wholesome minds,
And be endowed with merit and virtue.

original: 即能發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
analyzed: 即能發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translated: They are then able to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment.
They possess such power.

original: 設復有人犯四重五逆等罪。
analyzed: 設復有人犯四重五逆等罪。
translated: Even if there are people who have committed the four grave offenses and the five heinous crimes,
If they recite and uphold this dharani once,

original: 所有一切根本重罪悉皆除滅。
analyzed: 所有一切根本重罪悉皆除滅。
translated: All their fundamental grave offenses will be completely eradicated.

original: 況復依法作印受持者。🔽當知是人於萬萬億那由他諸佛所。
analyzed: 況復依法作印受持者。 當知是人於萬萬億那由他諸佛所。
translated: How much more so for those who make the seal and uphold it according to the Dharma!
Know that this person has heard this Dharma from countless myriads of kotis of nayutas of Buddhas in the past and is now able to hear it again.
If there are good men and good women,

original: 能受持憶念晝夜不忘者。🔽是人心所求願無不滿足。
analyzed: 能受持憶念晝夜不忘者。 是人心所求願無不滿足。
translated: Those who are able to uphold and remember it day and night without forgetting🔽Will have all their wishes fulfilled.
If one wishes to seek the supreme siddhi,
Use the eighth or fifteenth day of the bright fortnight.
Wash with fragrant water, put on new clean clothes,
And bathe after each visit to the toilet.
Do not go to the toilet while wearing these clean clothes.
When performing this method, do not eat on that day.
Make the mudrā for establishing the boundary and protecting the body.

original: 印已誦陀羅尼至於明旦。
analyzed: 印已誦陀羅尼至於明旦。
translated: After making the mudrā, recite the dhāraṇī until dawn.
In the ritual arena, place the image of the honored one.
Make the mudrā for inviting and recite the mantra.
Hang various colored banners and canopies.
Make offerings of incense and flowers.
When first entering the ritual arena,

original: 必須珍重至心奉請十方諸佛。
analyzed: 必須珍重至心奉請十方諸佛。
translated: One must respectfully and sincerely invite the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 至心懺悔讚歎三寶禮拜已。
analyzed: 至心懺悔讚歎三寶禮拜已。
translated: Repent with utmost sincerity, praise the Three Jewels, and pay homage.
In front of the image, set up a seat and equipment.
Kneel respectfully and sincerely make a vow.
Make the rosary mudrā.

original: 捻已一心誦真言一千八遍。
analyzed: 捻已一心誦真言一千八遍。
translated: Having pinched it, recite the mantra one thousand and eight times with a focused mind.
Next, hold an incense burner and burn incense, saying:

original: 此處無有種種供養上味飲食。
analyzed: 此處無有種種供養上味飲食。
translated: In this place there are no various offerings of the finest food and drink.
I am ashamed and apologize for this.

original: 世尊我由此等法印真言力。
analyzed: 世尊我由此等法印真言力。
translated: World-Honored One, by the power of these Dharma seals and mantras,
The name and noble status are difficult to hear.

original: 若有人稱念百千俱胝那由他諸佛名號。
analyzed: 若有人稱念百千俱胝那由他諸佛名號。
translated: If there are people who chant the names of a hundred thousand koṭīs of nayutas of buddhas,
And there are others who temporarily chant my name,
The blessings of these two people are exactly the same, without difference.

original: 爾時觀自在菩薩白佛言。
analyzed: 爾時觀自在菩薩白佛言。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One, for good men and good women,

original: 晝夜誦持我此明王翳迦惹吒真言者。
analyzed: 晝夜誦持我此明王翳迦惹吒真言者。
translated: Those who recite and uphold my vidyārāja's mantra, the Ekajaṭī mantra, day and night,

original: 得離一切苦惱一切障難怖畏。
analyzed: 得離一切苦惱一切障難怖畏。
translated: Will be freed from all sufferings, troubles, obstacles, and fears,
And the sins and obstacles of the three poisons will all be eliminated.
How much more so for those who practice in accordance with the Dharma!

original: 當知是人即得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提如在掌內。
analyzed: 當知是人即得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提如在掌內。
translated: Know that such people will attain supreme, perfect enlightenment, as if it were in the palm of their hand.

original: 爾時佛告觀自在菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 爾時佛告觀自在菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: At that time the Buddha said to the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara:

original: 善哉善哉善男子。🔽汝今能於一切眾生。
analyzed: 善哉善哉善男子。 汝今能於一切眾生。
translated: Excellent, excellent, good man!
You are now able to arouse the mind of great compassion for all sentient beings,

original: 而欲開示此大陀羅尼翳迦惹吒法印。
analyzed: 而欲開示此大陀羅尼翳迦惹吒法印。
translated: and wish to reveal this great dhāraṇī and the method of the eye-opening mudrā.

original: 若善男子由此法方便力故。
analyzed: 若善男子由此法方便力故。
translated: If a good man, by the power of this method,

original: 悉能救脫一切眾生所有病苦障難怖畏身語意業。
analyzed: 悉能救脫一切眾生所有病苦障難怖畏身語意業。
translated: is able to save and liberate all sentient beings from the suffering, hindrances, difficulties, and fears of illness, and the karmic actions of body, speech, and mind,

original: 乃至安立一切眾生於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 乃至安立一切眾生於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: and even establish all sentient beings in anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi,
there will definitely be no doubt.

original: 善男子此陀羅尼印等法門。
analyzed: 善男子此陀羅尼印等法門。
translated: Good man, this method of the dhāraṇī mudrā and so forth,
I also rejoice in.
I accept this mantra mudrā and so forth from you.
I now also approve of it.
Good man, you may now speak it.

original: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。🔽蒙佛印可從座而起。
analyzed: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。 蒙佛印可從座而起。
translated: At that time the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara,🔽having received the Buddha's approval, rose from his seat,
bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and then sat to one side.
And entered the samādhi of invincible power.

original: 從頂化出翳迦惹吒羅剎王。
analyzed: 從頂化出翳迦惹吒羅剎王。
translated: From the crown of his head, he manifested the rākṣasa king Ekajaṭa.
With three eyes and four arms,
All the eight classes of ghosts and spirits,

original: 大力然頂鬼王等驚怖走散。
analyzed: 大力然頂鬼王等驚怖走散。
translated: The powerful ghost king Randi, and others fled in terror and scattered.
Each lost their original power and did not know where to go.
Please show us protection, please show us protection.
Abandon all evil and harmful thoughts.

original: 從今已往并諸眷屬歸依佛法僧寶。
analyzed: 從今已往并諸眷屬歸依佛法僧寶。
translated: From now on, together with our relatives, we take refuge in the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha treasures.

original: 爾時翳迦惹吒降得然頂鬼王并諸眷屬。
analyzed: 爾時翳迦惹吒降得然頂鬼王并諸眷屬。
translated: At that time, Ekajaṭa subdued the ghost king Randi and his relatives.

original: 來詣觀自在菩薩摩訶薩所。
analyzed: 來詣觀自在菩薩摩訶薩所。
translated: He came to the place of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

original: 合掌恭敬白觀自在菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 合掌恭敬白觀自在菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: With palms joined in respect, he said to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva:

original: 我有甚深祕密陀羅尼真言。
analyzed: 我有甚深祕密陀羅尼真言。
translated: I have a very profound and secret dhāraṇī mantra.
It can crush the heavenly demons,

original: 及惡藥叉羅剎斯毒惡鬼神等。
analyzed: 及惡藥叉羅剎斯毒惡鬼神等。
translated: And the evil yakṣas, rākṣasas, poisonous evil ghosts and spirits,
And all epidemics, water, fire, and thieves.
It can also pacify all enemies.
Please allow me to recite this dhāraṇī.

original: 時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩讚言。
analyzed: 時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩讚言。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva-mahāsattva praised, saying,
Excellent, excellent, Ekajaṭī!

original: 善能調伏然頂鬼王及諸藥叉羅剎斯等。
analyzed: 善能調伏然頂鬼王及諸藥叉羅剎斯等。
translated: You are able to subdue the Rākṣasa king of the burning peak and all the yakṣas, rākṣasas, and others.

original: 汝有此祕密根本陀羅尼。
analyzed: 汝有此祕密根本陀羅尼。
translated: You have this secret fundamental dhāraṇī.
I allow you to speak it now.

original: 時翳迦惹吒蒙大聖許說。
analyzed: 時翳迦惹吒蒙大聖許說。
translated: At that time, Ekajaṭī, having received the great sage's permission to speak,
gave rise to great joy.
She then circumambulated Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva three times,
and sat to one side.

original: 對無量諸大菩薩及無量金剛密迹。
analyzed: 對無量諸大菩薩及無量金剛密迹。
translated: Facing the innumerable great bodhisattvas, the innumerable vajra secret traces,

original: 及八部鬼神一切藥叉羅剎眾前。
analyzed: 及八部鬼神一切藥叉羅剎眾前。
translated: and the eight divisions of spiritual beings, all the yakṣas and rākṣasa assemblies,
she then spoke the mantra, saying:🔽Namuorata nara-ya namu ariya🔽varuchi-shiva-ra-ya budhi-sattva-va-ya

original: 娜謀囉多娜二合跢囉二合夜引耶娜莫阿引哩耶
analyzed: 娜謀囉多娜二合跢囉二合夜引耶娜莫阿引哩耶

translated: Oṃ hūṃ jra ya ya svāhā. The mantra master bathes and ascends the platform, with the wisdom hand upright and the generosity hand folded in the palm.

The patience and vows touch each other at the tips.
The effort and power are bent and touch the back of the upper joints.
The meditation and wisdom touch the upper part of the generosity and wisdom.
Use the mantra of the mind of enlightenment.
